Replies.Reply: Based on Craig Davidson's short story collection      16TH August 2011   1. THE CHILD Gradually more and more visible in the darkness, the face of a child, Sam. He is 6 years old, blond, pale and miserably thin. As we move in on his eyes, we see his lids quickly contracting.
I don't know. A big street that started at the station. Yeah, by the beach. Behind? We just came from there!
So am I. He's coming to pick us up. Come on!
She didn't remember anything. It was already in there. She forgot about it, that's all.
No answer. Sam is watching TV.
I don't know. Find a job. Whatever.

No need to cry. I wouldn't have left you all alone.
What do you like the most at Auntie's?
Is that all? Nothing else besides the dogs?
The dogs and the truck. The house? Auntie?
I worked in a slaughterhouse. Not for long.
Yeah. I was a night watchman in a stadium for 6 months. Working for the city. In a parking lot too. I did replacements.
Karate, for 6 years. I even won Junior Division. And two years of boxing. Thai.

Are you okay? Breathe out of your mouth. In and out. Put your head back. Walk a little.

Okay, then I'll be getting back.

I didn't say it's not for the money!

Motherfucker's acting like he's on Canal Plus.
I don't know. Guys with money. Dealers.

Cut the shit. He's not dead. I didn't do it on purpose. I'm sorry about it.

Yeah. And I'll need some time to train.
Where are you? I can't see you. Where?

you have a lot of boyfriends?

A fight? What kind of fight? Is that the only job you could find?
I didn't know you were here. You scared me.
You bring girls back to my place now?
They were out of grapefruit. I took tropical fruit.
I'll make tea. I have some cookies. You drink tea, don't you?
I was fired this morning. I'm unemployed.
You had your sister fired. How does it feel?
You couldn't know? You couldn't know what?
Go to your room. Go upstairs immediately.
In his message he said he was in Strasbourg.
He abandoned his kid. He doesn't give a fuck about anything. All he ever cared about was himself. He's totally selfish.

Unzip your jacket! Empty your pockets!
No criminal record? You never fucked up?

Okay, I'll let you through because I'm outnumbered. Four against one, I don't stand a chance!
